Package cams.camp

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
cams.camp.Camp
public class Camp extends Object
Main entity class representing a camp.

This class encapsulates information about a camp. Date information is encapsulated in campDate, while editable info is encapsulated in campInfo.

Since:
2023-11-09
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(String campName, String location, String description, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate registrationDeadline, int totalSlots, boolean isVisible, String userGroup, Staff staffInCharge) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a new camp with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      campName - the name of the camp
      location - the location of the camp
      description - the description of the camp
      startDate - the start date of the camp
      endDate - the end date of the camp
      registrationDeadline - the registration deadline for the camp
      totalSlots - the total available slots for the camp
      isVisible - indicates whether the camp is visible
      userGroup - the user group associated with the camp
      staffInCharge - the staff in charge of this camp
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

      public void incrementCommitteePoint(Student student) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Increments the committee point for the specified student.
      Parameters:
      student - the student whose committee point needs to be incremented
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not a committee member for this camp
